language.description: application to manage sim card contacts using PC/SC or serial readers
language.pinsimact: Change Pin status on sim card
language.needpindisable: Pin1 enabled. To use monosim you need to disable it
language.suredeletesim: Are you sure to delete all contacts on sim ?
language.suredelcontact: Are you sure to delete follow contact ?
language.pinsimchk1: Pin1 check value don't match with Pin1, please retry
language.pinsimchk2: Pin1 need to be 4-digit numbers, retry
language.pinsimchk3: Operation not allowed, have only one attempt, perform it on phone
language.pinsimchk4: Operation not allowed, haven't any attempt to verify Pin1, try to use Puk1 on phone
language.simwritemode:
How would you like to update sim?
Override: delete all phonebook on sim and after write new contacts
Append: use all empty position on phonebook on sim to write new contacts
language.simwriteok: Write contacts on sim successfully completed
language.infodesc:
Cross platform C# application to manage sim card contacts using a standard PC/SC smartcard reader or serial (SmartMouse/Phoenix).
- Multilanguage (using xml language files in Language folder)
- Gui (using GTK# binding for GTK graphic libraries and Qyoto binding for QT graphic libraries)
- Debug/Trace (can be sended to console and also to a log file to read after)
